persistence
Interface HistoryDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
MockHistoryDao
public interface HistoryDao

This is the interface for any Data Access Object accessing the command history persistence. DAO pattern: Data Access Object interface

Author:
dmi

Field Summary
static int MAX_COMMAND_LENGTH
           
 
Method Summary
 void appendHistoryItem(java.lang.String historyItem)
          Store one command string in the history persistence.
 void clearHistory()
          Clear the whole history. calling readHistory() afterwards returns an empty list.
 java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> readHistory()
          Read the whole history that has been stored earlier.
 

Field Detail

MAX_COMMAND_LENGTH

static final int MAX_COMMAND_LENGTH
See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

readHistory

java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> readHistory()
Read the whole history that has been stored earlier. The list returned by this method may be very large.

Returns:
A list of command strings, ordered from youngest to oldest.

appendHistoryItem

void appendHistoryItem(java.lang.String historyItem)
Store one command string in the history persistence.

Parameters:
historyItem - The command string to be stored.

clearHistory

void clearHistory()
Clear the whole history. calling readHistory() afterwards returns an empty list.
